Package api.database.repository.thread

Interface ThreadRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Thread,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Thread,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Thread,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Thread,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Thread,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Thread>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Thread,Integer>
@Repository public interface ThreadRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Thread,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • deleteThreadsById

      @Modifying @Query(value="DELETE FROM qds_thread WHERE id=ANY(:threadIds)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteThreadsById(@Param("threadIds") Integer[] threadId)

    • getScenarioThreadIds

      @Query("SELECT t.id FROM Thread t WHERE t.scenarioId = :scenarioId") List<Integer> getScenarioThreadIds(@Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getThreads

      @Query(value="WITH start_event_types AS (SELECT unnest(ARRAY [\'FORK_OUT\', \'JOIN_OUT\', \'START\']) as type),\n end_event_types AS (SELECT unnest(ARRAY [\'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\', \'END\']) as type)\nSELECT (CASE WHEN t.is_global THEN 0 ELSE t.id END) as id,\n t.title,\n t.description,\n COALESCE(array_agg(tto.object_id)\n FILTER (WHERE tto.object_id IS NOT NULL), \'{}\') as object_ids,\n MIN(e_start.event_time) as start_time,\n MAX(e_end.event_time) as end_time,\n MIN(e_start.branching_id) as incoming_branching_id,\n MAX(e_end.branching_id) as outgoing_branching_id\nFROM qds_thread t\n JOIN qds_event e_start ON t.id = e_start.thread_id\n JOIN start_event_types ON e_start.event_type = start_event_types.type\n JOIN qds_event e_end ON t.id = e_end.thread_id\n JOIN end_event_types ON e_end.event_type = end_event_types.type\n LEFT JOIN qds_thread_to_object tto ON t.id = tto.thread_id\nWHERE t.scenario_id = :scenarioId\n AND (\n :threadId IS NULL\n OR\n t.id = CASE\n WHEN :threadId = 0 THEN (SELECT id FROM qds_thread WHERE scenario_id = :scenarioId AND is_global = true LIMIT 1)\n ELSE :threadId\n END\n )\nGROUP BY t.id, t.title, t.description, t.is_global\n", nativeQuery=true) List<ThreadResponse> getThreads(@Param("threadId") Integer threadId, @Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getGlobalThreadId

      @Query(value="SELECT id FROM qds_thread WHERE is_global=TRUE AND scenario_id=:scenarioId", nativeQuery=true) Integer getGlobalThreadId(@Param("scenarioId") Integer scenarioId)

    • getThreadBatch

      @Query(value="WITH RECURSIVE event_types AS (\n SELECT unnest(ARRAY[\'FORK_IN\', \'JOIN_IN\', \'END\']) as type\n ),\n fork_chain AS (\n SELECT thread_id,\n event_type,\n branching_id\n FROM qds_event e, event_types et\n WHERE thread_id = :threadId\n AND event_type = et.type\n\n UNION ALL\n\n -- Idziemy przez FORKi\n SELECT\n next_t.id,\n next_e.event_type,\n next_e.branching_id\n FROM fork_chain fc\n JOIN qds_event e ON e.branching_id = fc.branching_id\n AND e.event_type = \'FORK_OUT\'\n JOIN qds_thread next_t ON next_t.id = e.thread_id\n JOIN qds_event next_e ON next_e.thread_id = next_t.id\n JOIN event_types et ON next_e.event_type = et.type\n )\n SELECT\n COALESCE(\n array_agg(DISTINCT thread_id),\n \'{}\'::INTEGER[]\n ) as threads,\n COALESCE(\n array_agg(DISTINCT branching_id) FILTER (\n WHERE event_type = \'JOIN_IN\'),\n \'{}\'::INTEGER[]\n ) as joins_to_check,\n COALESCE(\n array_agg(DISTINCT branching_id) FILTER (\n WHERE event_type = \'FORK_IN\'),\n \'{}\'::INTEGER[]\n ) as forks\n FROM fork_chain;\n", nativeQuery=true) InternalThreadBatch getThreadBatch(@Param("threadId") Integer threadId)
